data.title: Art & Design Show Sarasota returns to Robarts Arena
data.meta_description: The Art & Design Show Sarasota, formerly the Sarasota Craft Show, returns to Sarasota, Dec. 6-8 at Robarts Arena, 3000 Ringling Blvd. Now in its 11th year, the show features exceptional works in fashion, decorative fiber, wearable art, leather, jewelry, glass, ceramics, wood,
data.text:
The Art & Design Show Sarasota, formerly the Sarasota Craft Show, returns to Sarasota, Dec. 6-8 at Robarts Arena, 3000 Ringling Blvd. Now in its 11th year, the show features exceptional works in fashion, decorative fiber, wearable art, leather, jewelry, glass, ceramics, wood, painting and sculpture by more than 80 of the nationâ€™s top artists. Starting this year, admission is free to the public. Hours are 10 a.m.-5 p.m. Friday and Saturday, Dec. 6-7, and 10 a.m.-4:30 p.m., Sunday, Dec. 8. For directions or information about the venue, call 941-365- 0818. For more information about the artists and the event, call 845-355-2400 or visit www.artanddesignshowsarasota.com.

Read the entire article on Venice Florida Weekly >>
